DbDetails.DbTable: nursery.nursery_chargelst n left join nursery.nursery_grade n0 on n.nj=n0.bm left join nursery.nursery_class n1 on n.bj=n1.bm left join nursery.nursery_children n2 on n.yebm=n2.bm left join nursery.nursery_acc_period n3 on n.period=n3.periodid left join nursery.nursery_chargeitem n4 on n.sfbm=n4.bm
DbDetails.Data: n0.mc nj,n1.mc bj,n2.name yebm,concat(PeriodYear,PeriodMonth) as period,n.rq,n.lsh,n4.mc sfbm,n.sl,n.dj,n.yjz,n.czy,n.bz,n.id
